message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $12,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, and this price reflects its quality and potential.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is already a competitive price.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
